title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: GRECERELLE Women's Loose Open Front Long Sleeve Chunky Knit Cable Cardigans Sweater with Pockets

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #24,892 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #176 in Women's Cardigans

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Cardigans

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan well-made, comfy, and not itchy or bulky, with a pretty cable knit design that stays soft after washing.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just Perfect.
items.body: Even better than I thought it would be. I got the ivory in medium so it'd be roomy & it is. My daughter gave me a great ivory sweater for Christmas years ago & it finally got holes in it and fell apart. I wore that thing nearly every day. This sweater is simple. Does not distract from what you're wearing. Sweater is perfect for taking the chill off. For me...the ivory goes with everything. I have no doubt I'll get a lot of use out of this item. If you're a size small...it will be a smidge bigger to give you a little extra room. I got the medium & again...has a bit of extra wiggle & snuggle room as well. The sizes do not fit tight....at all. This is a comfort sweater where you'll wrap yourself in warm goodness. You'll love it. Read more
items.author: Sky

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable.
items.body: Love the color. Good quality. Soft and comfortable. I got a medium and fits well. I would order a large if I wanted a looser fit. Read more
items.author: Deanna S

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and comfy sweater, wanted one size larger but not available.
items.body: It is a good quality sweater. Nice color (Navy Blue & Taupe), stylish & feels soft. It fits, but just barely, I wish it had been offered in a 3XXX. That is my best size, so it will fit loose on me. I'll still keep them both though. Read more
items.author: Victoria Breen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and versatile
items.body: This is my third sweater. I’ve ordered different colors, it’s comfy and the pockets are what makes it. Read more
items.author: laurie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: This is a great sweater. The royal blue is a true royal blue and not purple. The style is exactly as pictured and fit as expected. I wear a 18-20 or 2xl in most things and I am 5ft 1. I purchased the 2xl and very satisfied. It hangs loose on my shoulders due to slouchy style but is not too big. Sleeves are nice length. The cardigan falls to the upper thigh. The sweater is heavy and warm and is not a lightweight knit. The only fault I have found is the neckline and shoulder seam area. Due to the weight of the sweater, I feel the neckline will come loose eventually. I actually reinforced the seams using my sewing machine to help prevent this and you can't even tell it. I plan to order more colors. I do wish they offered a 3xl for a big baggy look. Read more
items.author: Wanda Meade

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not loose at all, and much shorter than the photo
items.body: I wanted to like this sweater. The color is really pretty. But the fit is nothing like the photo. The sweater is much shorter, the sleeves are incredibly tight and barely reach my wrist. The sweater does not even close in the front. For reference, I am 5‘4“ and typically wear a size small. If I had ordered a large, maybe it would have fit like the photo. I am returning it for these reasons. Otherwise, the sweater is a medium weight. It is fairly soft and seemed comfortable. Read more
items.author: Rebecca

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy Cozy
items.body: I am 5'3" and 176 lbs. I live in the North East USA. (It gets cold here). This is the 3rd sweater I have purchased from here. I absolutely LOVE IT. I bought both of mine in XL because I like my sweaters very loose fitting. I also purchased one for my mom and she loves hers. It's long but not too long. The stitching holds up when I wash it in the machine. (I don't have time for hand washing) The colors are bold. It's really warm. (I work in a cold office). And IT HAS POCKETS!!! I have had these sweaters snag on my bookbag, door handles, my hair clips... but you would never know. I plan to get most of the colors. Perfect sweater for this price point. Hope this helps other people's decisions. Read more
items.author: Nicchi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality, warm sweater
items.body: I am very pleased with the quality of this sweater and the cozy feel. It is a pretty long sweater (I'm 5'5, so average height), which I like and it's open (no buttons, zips). I purchased a medium and it's perfect for me. It's versatile and I can wear at work over dress pants or just with jeans around town. It is fairly soft and of a substantial weight - not thin or cheap feeling like so many online buys. Note that the white is not bright white, but rather a cream shade. I would have l would have liked it if both shades were offered, but I am quite happy with this purchase. Received it in one day , so no complaints there as a few others had mentioned. Read more
items.author: DAOHIO

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 08 Navy Blue, 23 Blue Gray, 29 Beige, 04 Dark Gray, 25 Rust Red, 06 Royal Blue, 30 Fp Color Cyan Pink, 16 Blackish Green, 31 Apricot, 30 Coffee, 03 Wine Red, 11 Dark Khaki, 33 Off White, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
